body_html:
You need MSVCP140.DLL in your system. Check if it is in your PATH and if it's not install Visual C++ Redistributable 2015 x64.

Check the NOTE under Pip Installation on Windows if you still have any doubts.
body_text:
You need MSVCP140.DLL in your system. Check if it is in your PATH and if it's not install Visual C++ Redistributable 2015 x64.
Check the NOTE under Pip Installation on Windows if you still have any doubts.
body:
You need `MSVCP140.DLL` in your system. Check if it is in your `PATH` and if it's not install [Visual C++ Redistributable 2015 x64](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=53587).

Check the **NOTE** under [Pip Installation on Windows](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.12/get_started/os_setup#pip_installation_on_windows) if you still have any doubts.
